input.name: __VIEWSTATE
__EVENTVALIDATION

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Attn: Parents/Guardians of 2020 Senior students,

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The announcement by Governor DeWine to close K-12 Schools for the remainder of the school year did not take most of us by surprise. However, it did not make the news any less painful. We understand our students (and parents) did not sign up for their child(ren) to receive an online education. We also understand many important events have been and still are being affected by this quarantine. Although it will look different, we will celebrate the graduating class of 2020 in a couple different ways.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The first way to honor our graduates is by a professionally produced video.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Video and pictures will be taken on May 20-21 from 1-7 PM in 10-minute time slots. Please be sure to adhere to your designated time slot; it will not be necessary to arrive early or to remain after your designated time

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: A sign-up sheet will be posted on the Senior Google Classroom beginning on Wednesday, April 29 @ 3 PM

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The senior and up to four family members will be permitted to come into the school through Door 6

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Video and 8x10 pictures will be taken of each senior walking across the stage in their cap and gown, moving the tassel, etc. Any awards you may be receiving can be picked up at this time as well.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We would like parents/seniors to also communicate via email to Mr. Herr any awards/scholarships received (please make sure spelling is correct) by May 21 so this information can be included in the video

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The professional video will be available to view on Sunday, May 31 at 7 PM

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The second way to honor our graduates is a presentation of diplomas and a parade.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: McComb High School will present diplomas on Sunday, May 31 at 2 PM in the parking lot behind the football stadium.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All graduates should enter via Panther Parkway as all other entrances will be blocked off.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Only one vehicle will be permitted per graduate in the parking lot. This vehicle will be directed to park in a designated area and should arrive by 1:45 PM

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 36pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Each graduate’s vehicle will be directed to drive up and receive their diploma and 8x10 picture. They will then begin the parade lineup.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The parade route will be posted on the school website by May 28 and family members not immediately in the car with the graduate are encouraged to practice safe distancing and find spaces along the parade route to celebrate the class of 2020. We encourage positive signs and noisemakers as the parade marches through McComb. Let’s make this moment as special for our seniors as we can. Cars, convertibles or trucks used in the parade may be decorated appropriately as well.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your patience as we have waited to make firm decisions until we were given more information regarding a timeline of this quarantine. We feel delaying the ceremony would not be wise and the current plan honors our 2020 graduates while maintaining the safety guidelines set forth by our governor. If you have any questions about these procedures, or any other school-related questions, please contact me at the school via phone call or email.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Respectfully submitted,

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Jeremy J. Herr

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: 7-12 Grade Principal

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: McComb Local Schools

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.title: Article Title: McComb Local School Update: April 24, 2020
Article Title: McComb Local School Updated School Calendar

h3.span: McComb Local School Updated School Calendar

span.title: Article Title: Teacher and Staff Parades

div.span: On Thursday, May 7 and Friday, May 8 we will be having a teacher and staff parade throughout the district. Since our district is so large (in area) we felt it would be easier to divide it into two days in order to see all of the students in the district. The parades will be led by the bus drivers who will basically drive their routes (without stopping) and teachers and staff will follow behind in their personal vehicles.

br.span: Meet in the parking lot behind the football field at 12:45 PM
The parade will begin at 1:00 PM and last until approximately 3:00 PM
On this day we will be following Becky Curtis and Robyn Downing as well as driving through Hoytville
Meet in the parking lot behind the football field at 12:45 PM
The parade will begin at 1:00 PM and last until approximately 4:00 PM
On this day we will be following Becky Ream, Deb Abbott, and Chelsea Sherick
At 4:00 PM we will continue the parade around the Village of McComb

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Kindergarten screening is tentatively planned for June 2nd. This is subject to change. You will receive a phone call by May 22nd with an assigned time which must be followed, as a very limited number of individuals will be in the building. Please note that only the child being screened and a parent will be allowed in the building, entering door 1 only (by the playground). More information will be provided in the phone call.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Preschool screening information: A screening will be held on June 4th for all children currently on the list for preschool who will turn 4 before December, 2020. Any child turning 4 after Christmas Break of 2020 will be placed on a waiting list and screened as needed when positions open up.

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px

p.span: In order for those currently on the list to be screened and keep a spot on the list, those children MUST attend the June 4th screening in order to remain on the list. A phone call will be made to those currently on the list to set up an exact screening time. The assigned time must then be followed as given, due to the fact that a very limited number of persons will be in the building. Only the child being screened and 1 adult will be permitted in the building during the screening time. Only door 1 (by the playground) will be used for entrance to the screening that day. Again, if you are currently on the list, you will receive a phone call with your assigned screening time by May 22nd.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: This year we’ve reviewed the 7 habits and continued to live them in our lives. Now let’s show our community!!! Make a poster about your favorite habit(s) and display it in a window at your home for people walking by or driving by to see! (Can’t decide which one is your favorite, then make/show more than one!!) If it is OK with your parents, take a picture of your poster(s) and send it to

span.style: color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: and we’ll post it on our McComb Elementary Facebook Page and our McComb School website! Can’t wait to see your posters. How many can we make by the end of May??? Keep living the habits because great habits make great leaders!

span.style: color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px

span.span: If you are having laptop issues, please email Mrs. Cawley @

a.style: color: #1155cc; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff

span.style: color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px

span.span: and she will set up a time to meet you at door #1 at the school to take a look at your laptop. You are not allowed in the building, but she will meet you at the door and see if she can quickly fix your laptop, or if it's something that will take a day or so to fix.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff
div.span: She'll be available via email every weekday. She may not answer immediately, but will answer as soon as she can.

span.style: color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px

span.span: For a listing of available scholarships please check the Scholarship Google Document, available

span.style: color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px
color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff;font-family:Tahoma;font-size:14px

span.span: . Many deadlines are quickly approaching! See Mrs. Becker, High School Counselor, with any questions.

h3.a: McComb Local School Update April 8, 2020: Meal Information

p.style: margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: center; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: Meal pick up will be every Tuesday and Thursday.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: A drive thru pick-up line at school is from 11:00 am-12:00 pm (use student drop off traffic route).

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: A drive thru pick-up line at HYCO in Hoytville is from 11:00 am-12:00 pm.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: Any children between the ages of 1-18 are eligible to receive meals.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

u.span: IF YOU ALREADY SIGNED UP YOU DO NOT NEED TO CALL UNLESS YOU NO LONGER NEED MEALS OR NEED TO CHANGE YOUR PICK-UP LOCATION.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: Due to preparing perishable food, anyone on the list that does NOT pick-up meals without prior notification will be removed.

p.style: text-align: center; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: Any changes in meals will be communicated via Ohio Alerts. Any future meal pick-up dates will be communicated via Ohio Alerts.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial
p.span: McComb School appreciates your cooperation during this time of uncertainty. Information can and likely will change frequently. Every attempt will be made to communicate changes in a timely manner.
